caption: The video narrates the adventurous tale of three children at an amusement park. They first drive into a not-so-typical park where they encounter a glowing man, almost ghost-like in appearance. They subsequently fall into a dimly lit chamber within the amusement park. Here, they meet a one-eyed doctor and a naval lieutenant. Together with these two adults, the kids embark on an exploratory journey through the park, driving around in a little car.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Is it a cartoon movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like a cartoon movie.
